references.reason: This paper introduces a foundation model for image segmentation that achieves state-of-the-art results and is used as a comparison point in the current work.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces a highly efficient and scalable diffusion model architecture that is leveraged in the proposed model.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work in diffusion models that provides valuable insights into the underlying principles and techniques used in the proposed model.
This paper introduces a novel diffusion model architecture based on transformers that enables efficient training and inference, which is used in the current work.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces a vision foundation model that demonstrates the potential of leveraging natural language supervision for visual tasks, which is used as a comparison point in the current work.
